pullrequest.title: Replace joint frame references with Jc and Jp

content.raw:
> On 2019-04-26 Alejandro Castro wrote: I don’t think we should repeat the snippet and illustration here (which by the way has a completely different formatting to the schematic we just created). IMO just providing the link to the relevant URDF docs is enough. 
That is, I’d stop at: “This is illustrated in the [URDF documentation](http://wiki.ros.org/urdf/XML/joint)”.

this URDF snippet is not included in the URDF documentation at that link; they have a slightly different snippet of just a `<joint>` and some sub-elements, so for people who are not sure of the difference between coordinate frames SDF and URDF, I hope this could be helpful.
content.html:
On 2019-04-26 Alejandro Castro wrote: I don’t think we should repeat the snippet and illustration here (which by the way has a completely different formatting to the schematic we just created). IMO just providing the link to the relevant URDF docs is enough. That is, I’d stop at: “This is illustrated in the URDF documentation”.

this URDF snippet is not included in the URDF documentation at that link; they have a slightly different snippet of just a <joint> and some sub-elements, so for people who are not sure of the difference between coordinate frames SDF and URDF, I hope this could be helpful.
